tagline: Growl style that forwads everything to Notification Center.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Notification Center is Awesome.
But a lot of apps still don't support it. A of apps do, however, support Growl. **Purr helps bridge the gap.** Purr will take any notifications sent to Growl, and forward it straight to Notification Center.

Download it [here](https://github.com/downloads/maxgoedjen/Purr/Purr.zip).
name: Purr
